powerSourceObject.label: Power source object ID
powerSourceObject.help: Select the ioBroker state containing power data (usually from Shelly energy meter)

pollingInterval.label: Polling interval (ms)
pollingInterval.help: How often to check the power data in milliseconds

powerControlObject.label: OpenDTU power control object ID
powerControlObject.help: Select the OpenDTU power control state for setting inverter limits

feedInThreshold.label: Feed-in change threshold (W)
feedInThreshold.help: Minimum change in feed-in power to trigger control adjustment

targetFeedIn.label: Target feed-in power (W)
targetFeedIn.help: Target feed-in power (negative value for export to grid)
